## RedemptionDetails.actualBPDAmount property

Amount of BPD that was actually redeemed by the transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
actualBPDAmount: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

This can end up being lower than `attemptedBPDAmount` due to interference from another transaction that modifies the list of Vaults.
